thread.title: Great location.easy access via subway.
thread.title_full: Great location.easy access via subway. - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CLAIREPAULDerbyshire
title: Great location.easy access via subway.
text:
Hotel excellent location,close to shops bars and subway, although dated,no free internet,no tea or coffee facilities.
Brought city pass to visit the main attractions (definitely worth it) .Used subways and the buses to get around to save time.
